text:
Is this really the way @realDonaldTrump's administration intends to celebrate #NationalChildHealthDay?

Scrapping the rule that keeps mercury – a known neurotoxin – from polluting our environment and permanently affecting our young, developing children is a new low https://t.co/CWp1VWyat1

PSA: @EPA hosted its ONLY hearing today on @realDonaldTrump’s #DirtyPowerPlan – a plan that fails to protect the American people from the serious risks of climate change and fails to produce the same health and energy saving benefits that were achieved under the #CleanPowerPlan https://t.co/SJMi2fx902

The Trump administration is now claiming cancer-causing radiation is good for human health in its justification for gutting yet another vital environmental protection. 

Yes, you read that right.
https://t.co/6ibGxUMo6Y

Congress came together today around a long-term funding bill for aviation that provides certainty to businesses and funding for #infrastructure that keeps Delawareans moving – including reforms I’ve championed to safely speed up TSA security lines ✈️✈️ https://t.co/QEIoDZuEz4

NEWS: With overwhelming bipartisan support, the Senate has passed a sweeping opioid package which includes my bills with @SenJohnThune and @PatRoberts to help those suffering from addiction have better, more efficient access to the life-saving treatments they need https://t.co/JPJuoFGx51

Today, I had the chance to sit down with Terra and Donita from @girlsincde to talk about the important work they’re doing to reduce the number of young women in the juvenile justice system. Thank you both for your commitment to empowering #StrongSmartBold girls https://t.co/sBybkysS1S

I’ve read the FBI report. 

❌ Dr. Ford wasn’t interviewed. 
❌ Dozens of people who know Dr. Ford, Ms. Ramirez and Brett Kavanaugh weren’t interviewed. 
❌ Brett Kavanaugh wasn’t interviewed.

It is clear this process was never designed to inform.

Americans are right to be concerned about the nomination of Brett Kavanaugh for endless reasons, but we can't forget about what his confirmation would mean for our environment and public health. Here’s a quick rundown of what’s at stake: https://t.co/48V57aZdPA
I’ll be speaking on the Senate floor about why I’m voting against Judge Kavanaugh. Watch live here: https://t.co/MWzc1oLEt7

In an effort to get to the truth before taking such a consequential vote, my Democratic colleagues and I called for a nonpartisan FBI investigation.

What we ended up with falls far short of what the Senate, Dr. Ford and the American people deserve. https://t.co/MuWxqZ2Z75

To all my Senate colleagues:
One of the most important responsibilities we have is considering and confirming nominees to serve on the highest court in our land.
 
Before we walk into the Senate chamber and cast our final vote, remember history is watching https://t.co/OMS0HbUfTY

Neurotoxins like #mercury affect human health and the environment in devastating and long-lasting ways. It’s nonsensical that @realdonaldtrump’s @EPA would weaken bipartisan and effective protections against it. https://t.co/4x8KrA7Fse
Join us on 10/20 to watch the christening ceremony of the #USSDELAWARE with your fellow Delawareans  #netde https://t.co/IlbeeptNMX

Today I joined #postal workers in Wilmington to rally against the Trump administration’s foolish effort to privatize the #USPS. Earlier this year, I intro’d legislation to stabilize, preserve & improve the USPS to protect this essential part of our infrastructure and economy. https://t.co/UTlyCbSwih

This is a step back in the fight against #climatechange and it hurts American exporters. Phasing down HFCs is a bipartisan goal with the backing of industry and environmental groups, and my bill with @SenJohnKennedy spurs transition to clean alternatives: https://t.co/JgrUdXu7nR https://t.co/p8LOjbUXkT

I’m about to be on the floor to discuss America’s Water Infrastructure Act – a major bipartisan bill I co-authored to update and enhance Delaware water #infrastructure to create jobs, protect communities and secure safe drinking water. Watch live:  https://t.co/QwQhX9Fngz

Every year in the U.S., the wealthiest country on Earth, nearly 900 women die during childbirth.
 
50,000 are severely injured.
 
It's inexcusable that we are failing to protect pregnant women, particularly women of color, at what should be a joyful time https://t.co/CdKXCnMn8v

BIG NEWS for job growth and public health: a major bipartisan bill I co-authored as ranking member of @EPWDems to update and enhance our nation’s water #infrastructure has passed the Senate and is on its way to the president’s desk. My statement: https://t.co/uE09Fe2wGZ https://t.co/LRqDB7Z8Lw

Today, I joined 49 of my Senate colleagues – and more than 20 of the nation’s top health care organizations – to support @SenatorBaldwin’s efforts to force a senate vote on overturning #JunkPlans 

https://t.co/OcUIVEC11R

FACT CHECK: @realDonaldTrump says he kept his promise to protect coverage for patients with pre-existing conditions. The truth? His administration is arguing those exact protections should be struck down.
https://t.co/b4T7i0xKVi

On this #WorldMentalHealthDay, let's work to ensure patients across the First State and country can get access to treatment with any barriers – that means saying #NoJunkPlans that limit coverage to the 1 in 5 Americans who have a mental illness

Republicans are currently campaigning on policies they have blatantly fought to destroy just to score political points. 
 
We need action, not talk. We need to protect those living with pre-existing conditions. 
https://t.co/26GP1RFF9u https://t.co/51KO6LnMaw

I'm proud to join the fight for #BlanketChange so we can make sure that all pregnant women in America can be healthy and safe during this critical time in their lives https://t.co/K0PCrdzcKh https://t.co/OVgwULWXD4

These reports are extremely troubling, and I’d like answers. It’s why I think EPA employees and the American people deserve to hear directly from Acting Administrator Wheeler on this matter. Racist, hateful language has no place at the EPA or anywhere else in our country. https://t.co/Ax9Q7pSw1n
Great meeting with you, @mayitaalcaldesa! Thanks for sharing your ideas with me and for your steadfast commitment and leadership in our fight to protect our planet. https://t.co/BKzI4mwnA8
As co-author of this major #infrastructure bill, I fought hard to make sure key Delaware priorities were included -- and I’m proud we were able to deliver: https://t.co/d3CFyHHuTC
.@realDonaldTrump’s proposal to weaken methane standards is nonsensical and dangerous. Glad to join fellow @SenateDems to urge the administration to reverse course. https://t.co/PFXxfOsp6c

Today at the Port of Wilmington, I discussed my major water infrastructure bill that’s on its way to the President’s desk to be signed into law. This bill makes big investments in critical infrastructure and means more good-paying jobs here at home. https://t.co/0idfjCs1sw https://t.co/OJ9kfUIEdl

This Trump proposal doesn’t just derail progress on #climatechange and disrupt American automakers: It’s also riddled with legal errors and, let’s call it, “creative math” -- that will lead to a likely failure in court
https://t.co/1p3bs26uJ4

Today, it was my honor to keynote @AWEA’s annual offshore wind conference. If we invest in the clean energy of tomorrow like offshore wind, it will be a win for our economy, our energy security, our health and our planet https://t.co/5Yts95miGY
Congratulations to Dana Bowe from West Seaford Elementary School who was just named Delaware’s Teacher of the Year! #netde
You know what doesn’t care about your ‘instincts,’ @realdonaldtrump? Rising sea levels, historic hurricanes and increased global temperatures, just to name a few. https://t.co/9q4hgTVQgZ

Obesity is an epidemic that our country cannot afford to ignore. It is linked to diabetes, heart disease, some cancers, and maternal mortality. It is absolutely crucial that we address this issue not only during National Obesity Care Week, but every day. #NOCW2018 https://t.co/dNiiA5QFVP

Facilities like @AdesisInc's new laboratory expansion promote job growth and support new and evolving technologies throughout the First State. It was an honor to speak at their ribbon cutting today and I wish them all the best for future growth and profitability! https://t.co/tRxtFlH9oc

A few months ago, former EPA Administrator Scott Pruitt was using government resources to get his wife a Chick-Fil-A franchise. Now, we're learning @SecretaryZinke is misusing government resources in his pursuit to provide his wife with the perks of his job. When will it end? https://t.co/4CewCjtPYm

Today is the day! After a Delawarean’s call for action in @delawareonline, calls to the Secretary of the Navy, and letters @ChrisCoons, @JohnCarneyDE and I sent detailing the First State’s long and proud Naval history, we are christening the #USSDelaware https://t.co/akgWRPbBJo

If you’re in Delaware, it’s not too late to attend one of our three watch events across the state. Doors in Newark, Dover and Georgetown open at 9:30am. Come watch the christening of the #USSDelaware — the first ship to bear the First State’s name since 1923. https://t.co/jBRI5xVIS2

.@DrBiden is right. American shipbuilding is the best in the world, and the #USSDelaware continues that proud legacy. Learn more about what it means to have one of the most state of the art submarines in the world named for our state: https://t.co/QkEkCPbFey

The christening of the #USSDelaware is underway in Newport News, Virginia! Proud to be here with @DrBiden, @JohnCarneyDE, @BobbyScott, and many military officials and distinguished guests #SSN791 https://t.co/qwMaMmgRso

Today, with the christening of the #USSDelaware, we honor a new generation of American sailors as they prepare to take this submarine through its sea trials and eventually to seas throughout the world – protecting our democracy and helping to preserve our planet. #SSN791 https://t.co/F5ic1EyB9R

Honored to be here as @DrBiden officially christens the #USSDelaware and welcomes one of the most state of the art submarines in the world to the First State military family. Bravo Zulu! https://t.co/cjbLgkDgJg

No one should have to choose between saving their life or saving money. 

The #ACA made great strides to reduce medical bankruptcies, but we can and must do more. I've released bipartisan draft legislation to increase transparency and drive down costs https://t.co/pLzk2esmt2

-Nearly 1/2 of Guatemalan children under 5 are malnourished.
-Honduras has one of the highest murder rates in the world.
-El Salvador is the world’s most violent country not at war.

Meanwhile, @realDonaldTrump wants to slash aid to these countries in half
https://t.co/IibU2oIvlf

BIG NEWS: Tomorrow, @POTUS will sign into law my major water infrastructure bill with @SenJohnBarrasso that invests in critical infrastructure across the country, create jobs here at home, and prepare communities for the growing risks of #climatechange. https://t.co/DztgJjF601

The Trump Administration wants to take us ten steps back in our fight for #LGBTQ equality. We cannot let that happen.
 
I stand with the LGBTQ community of the First State and across this country when I say that transgender Americans #WontBeErased https://t.co/vESscfUDaf

READ: Today, @POTUS will sign into law my bipartisan infrastructure bill with @SenJohnBarrasso that invests in water infrastructure across the country, creates jobs, and prepare communities for the growing risks of #climatechange. Our @USATODAY op-ed: https://t.co/ofHKKGS1VR

Hate and violent rhetoric have absolutely no place in this country. We need action and common sense gun control reforms that are long overdue. We have a moral responsibility to put people’s lives over politics

Delawareans of all faiths and walks of life came together at Memorial Hall today to stand in solidarity with #TreeOfLifeSynagogue. These 11 worshippers cannot have died in vain. We must all reject hate, work for peace and unity, and show love to all our neighbors https://t.co/rlwFZFDwCM

Why is the Trump administration using bogus legal arguments to block California's right to set its own clean car standards? Especially after Congress in 2007 backed California. My letter to @EPAAWheeler and @SecElaineChao: https://t.co/tndkMTawlf https://t.co/mjBr6TAvEx

Wow. Check out these interactive climate graphs that show us just how drastically warmer cities across the country will be in just one generation. The results of climate change could be devastating for the health and safety of our people and planet. It's time to #ActOnClimate. https://t.co/XQ4DvDsrZm

ICYMI: Read my op-ed with @SenJohnBarrasso on our major water infrastructure bill that @POTUS just signed into law. It invests in critical infrastructure, creates jobs here at home, and prepares communities for the growing risks of climate change. https://t.co/XbJ9GPKh4k

There are a lot of terrible ideas coming out of Trump's EPA, but one that is particularly terrible is the #DirtyPowerScam. It fails to protect public health, hinders our ability to address climate change, and could result in job loss. My letter: https://t.co/VZeXsrChqu

Delawareans: It’s time to #GetCovered! 

Today is the first day of the #ACA open enrollment. Don’t delay – go to https://t.co/3KDAz9OcAn to explore your options and find a #healthcare plan that works for you https://t.co/624FLTVXxE

Hours after Americans voted for an independent check on his administration, @realDonaldTrump fires the Attorney General and installs a partisan ally to oversee the Mueller probe. 

This isn’t a coincidence. We need accountability and to protect the Special Counsel’s investigation
Our @destateparks attract visitors from all over the region. Now we have a new edition for everyone to check out in Yorklyn! #netde https://t.co/r577F9dpPP

Great day to celebrate and introduce a beautiful addition to @DEStateParks. Auburn Valley State Park in Yorklyn promotes environmental stewardship, supports our economy and ensures that Delawareans will be able to enjoy acres of preserved land for years to come. https://t.co/FnZ7UYp4If

This #VeteransDay, let’s recommit to improving the quality of services and benefits for our veterans and their families so that when we say #ThankYouForYourService, our veterans will know we really mean it. 

Read my full piece in @delawareonline: https://t.co/oOHWnWCzUB

One of my favorite things to do is to meet with young people who are excited to change our world. Today, I spent time in Washington, DC with students from @UDelaware who are well on their way to being the leaders of tomorrow. Thanks for visiting! https://t.co/Cz3CJTOU6m

After months of bipartisan negotiations, #VIDA is an important step forward that will protect our waterways and marine ecosystems from harmful vessel discharges – from coastal communities in Delaware all the way to the Great Lakes. https://t.co/287icoAkAi

During my years as governor, we made it a priority to reduce the teen pregnancy rate in Delaware. One of the ways we continue to find success is by expanding access to birth control and contraceptives – giving women freedom to make their own health care decisions #ThxBirthControl

Proud to have worked with @SenBillNelson, @SenJohnThune, @RobPortman, and @SenStabenow on this important bill that protects our waters from ballast water discharge and provides regulatory certainty for vessel owners and mariners. https://t.co/kzk75Tas6r

Recycling doesn't just protect the environment, it's an economic engine that drives more than $100 billion annually and supports over 500,000 jobs. Excited to join my co-chair of the Senate Recycling Caucus @JohnBoozman to highlight how recycling moves America forward https://t.co/KNyqTiJNoN

Longer droughts and the strongest wildfires in California history don’t keep happening by coincidence. Refusal to confront #climatechange head-on burdens future generations with more extreme weather, higher costs and more risk to public safety
https://t.co/EoxbgVX5o7

We can get big things done when we work together. I’m proud of what we’ve accomplished for Delaware recently at @EPWDems – including a major water #infrastructure bill signed into law last month and a measure passed yesterday to protect waterways from pollution https://t.co/SivX563hhS

.@EPA's abrupt dismissal of scientists from advisory committees jeopardize the environment and human health. Today, @SenWhitehouse and I led a group of @SenateDems in demanding that @EPA hand over all documents related to it -- we want answers. https://t.co/b6EZpU977W

Today I joined Ms. Gonzales at the La Red Health Center as she enrolled in a health insurance plan. With La Red's help, she was able to cut her monthly premiums in half.

For help enrolling, speak to navigators at places like La Red or go to https://t.co/FtdG0zGP5m before Dec. 15 https://t.co/M9oI6ZMebR

If @POTUS intends to nominate Wheeler to be @EPA Administrator, then he must come before the Environment and Public Works Committee so that we can look at his record as Acting Administrator objectively to see if any improvements have been made at the agency since he took the helm https://t.co/PBCxqRbYSQ
